mapper.select: select ideaId, title, content, likes, visits from idea i inner join user u on i.userId = u.userId;
mapper.insert: insert into idea (title, content, likes, visits, typeId) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{likes}, #{visits}, #{typeId});
mapper.update: update user set sign = #{sign}, email = #{email}, gender = #{gender}, head = #{head} where userAccount = #{userAccount};
